description.full: Challenge yourself in a microscale world of 5 where speed and timing is everything. Jump and duck to avoid obstacles, and unlock doors with quick reflex memory puzzles. Scan your 5 Gum Micro Pack to unlock an original Avatar Prop. Upload video of your jump skills to KinectShare and share with friends.
